volunteer_experience.info: Student member of Educational board of Advanced Technology. The board consists of few students and few teachers along with educational staff of the study. The board is responsible for analyzing the feedback obtained from the students and advising the program director for improvement in the education. The board is also responsible to advise on the overall Constitution of the education and it's implementation.

publications: [{"title":"Performance improvement of a PCM cold box by two bilayers configuration","subtitle":"International Communications in Heat and Mass Transfer","date":"March 28, 2022","description":"A method to increase the storage time of frozen materials in a PCM cold box maintained at a sub-zero temperature has been investigated in this paper. The configuration of a single Phase Change Material (PCM) pack surrounding the payload and subsequently surrounded by anÂ insulation layerÂ is termed as a bilayer configuration. Our study shows that by changing the configuration into two bilayers, which is a series of PCM and insulation pairs, a significant advantage is gained in terms of the total time for which the payload stays at the desired frozen temperature.Â "},{"title":"Energy profile algorithm for real time signal processing of an interferometric accelerometer","subtitle":"Conference presentation, IONS KOALA 2016, Melbourne, Australia","date":"December 2, 2016"},{"title":"Back journey of solar sail","subtitle":"Bihar Science Congress","date":"May 2008","description":"Presented paper in \"Bihar Science congress, India\" was youngest participant to present paper."},{"title":"Possibility of space transport using radiation pressure","subtitle":"Scientific Foresight, Patna, India","date":"December 24, 2007","description":"Presented paper in International conference on \"Solar Sail\""}]

honors_and_awards.description: Awarded as best student of year, for the academic performance during the academic year 2014-15 as a student of Advanced Technology at University of Twente. Award is given by Royal Holland Society of Science and Humanities (KHMW), The Netherlands, to the best student of a particular study from different universities across the Netherlands.
